per_criterion.name: Task Response (TR)
evidence_quotes: While some argue this requirement would be beneficial, I partially agree with this proposition, believing that voluntary participation would be more effective than compulsion.
In conclusion, while community service offers valuable learning experiences and social benefits, making it compulsory may diminish its intended impact.
suggestions: Clarify the extent of agreement in the introduction.
Provide more specific examples of community service activities.
Expand on the potential benefits of voluntary participation.

per_criterion.name: Coherence & Cohesion (CC)
evidence_quotes: On the one hand, mandatory community service could provide numerous benefits to both students and society.
On the other hand, forcing students to participate in community service may have counterproductive effects.
suggestions: Use more varied cohesive devices to enhance flow.
Ensure each paragraph has a clear topic sentence.
Link ideas more explicitly between paragraphs.

per_criterion.name: Lexical Resource (LR)
evidence_quotes: foster a sense of social responsibility
develop empathy and understanding of diverse social issues
potentially developing negative attitudes toward volunteering
suggestions: Use synonyms to enhance lexical variety.

per_criterion.name: Grammatical Range & Accuracy (GRA)
evidence_quotes: students might view them as mere obligations rather than meaningful contributions
adding compulsory service to already demanding academic schedules could increase stress levels

errors.span: students might view them as mere obligations rather than meaningful contributions

suggestions: Ensure subject-verb agreement is consistently accurate.
Minimize the use of passive voice.
